description: Creates a subscription target in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: applicableAssetTypes
parameters.description: The asset types that can be included in the subscription target. (string) ---

parameters.name: authorizedPrincipals
parameters.description: The authorized principals of the subscription target. (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which subscription target is created.

parameters.name: environmentIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the environment in which subscription target is created.

parameters.name: manageAccessRole
parameters.description: The manage access role that is used to create the subscription target.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the subscription target.

parameters.name: subscriptionTargetConfig
parameters.description: The configuration of the subscription target. (dict) --- The details of the subscription target configuration. The content of the subscription target configuration. The form name included in the subscription target configuration.

nested_params.name: content
nested_params.description: The content of the subscription target configuration.

nested_params.name: formName
nested_params.description: The form name included in the subscription target configuration.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: applicableAssetTypes
nested_items.description: The asset types that can be included in the subscription target.

nested_items.name: authorizedPrincipals
nested_items.description: The authorised principals of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription target was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the subscription target.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the subscription target was created.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment in which the subscription target was created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: manageAccessRole
nested_items.description: The manage access role with which the subscription target was created.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: provider
nested_items.description: The provider of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: subscriptionTargetConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: content
nested_items.description: The content of the subscription target configuration.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The form name included in the subscription target configuration.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the subscription target.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription target was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who updated the subscription target.
